text: Never a Dull Moment is the fourth studio album by Rod Stewart and was released on 21 July 1972 through Mercury Records. It topped the album charts in Canada and the United Kingdom. It went to the top 10 in Australia, the Netherlands, Norway, Sweden and the United States. == Track listing == == References == Category:1972 albums Category:Rod Stewart albums
title: Never a Dull Moment (Rod Stewart album)
